00022 affx::SpfFile::SpfFile() {
00023   clearOptions();
00024   clearHeaderInfo();
00025   clearCidx();
00026 }

00028 void
00029 affx::SpfFile::clearOptions()
00030 {
00031   m_spf_format=affx::SpfFile::FMT_UNSET;
00032   //
00033   m_has_allele_info=0;
00034   m_has_context_info=0;
00035   m_has_channel_info=0;
00036   m_has_rep_type_info=0;
00037 }

00039 void
00040 affx::SpfFile::clearHeaderInfo()
00041 {
00042   m_header_format=-1;
00043   m_header_chipTypes.resize(0);
00044   m_header_numCols=-1;
00045   m_header_numRows=-1;
00046   m_header_numProbesets=-1;
00047   m_header_numChannels=-1;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void
00051 affx::SpfFile::clearCidx()
00052 {
00053   // all formats v1, v2, v3, v4
00054   m_name_cidx=-1;
00055   m_type_cidx=-1;
00056   m_num_match_cidx=-1;
00057 
00058   // format v1 and v2
00059   // all level 0
00060   m_v2_num_blocks_cidx=-1;
00061   m_v2_block_sizes_cidx=-1;
00062   m_v2_block_annotations_cidx=-1;
00063   m_v2_num_probes_cidx=-1;
00064   m_v2_probes_cidx=-1;
00065   m_v2_block_alleles_cidx=-1;
00066   m_v2_block_contexts_cidx=-1;
00067   m_v2_block_channels_cidx=-1;
00068   m_v2_block_rep_types_cidx=-1;
00069 
00070   // format v3
00071   // level 1
00072   m_v3_allele_lbl_cidx=-1;
00073   m_v3_allele_code_cidx=-1;
00074   // level 2
00075   m_v3_context_lbl_cidx=-1;
00076   m_v3_context_code_cidx=-1;
00077   m_v3_channel_code_cidx=-1;
00078   m_v3_annotation_code_cidx=-1;
00079   // level 3
00080   m_v3_probe_id_cidx=-1;
00081 
00082   // format v4
00083   // level 1
00084   m_v4_block_lbl_cidx=-1;
00085   m_v4_annotation_code_cidx=-1;
00086   m_v4_allele_code_cidx=-1;
00087   m_v4_context_code_cidx=-1;
00088   m_v4_channel_code_cidx=-1;
00089   m_v4_rep_type_cidx=-1;
00090   // level 2
00091   m_v4_probe_id_cidx=-1;
00092 }
00093 
00094 #define DUMP_CIDX_HEAD(_head) { printf("== %-30s\n",_head); }
00095 #define DUMP_CIDX(_cidx) { printf("  %-30s = %3d\n",#_cidx,_cidx); }
00096 
00097 void affx::SpfFile::dumpCidx()
00098 {
00099   DUMP_CIDX_HEAD("features");
00100   DUMP_CIDX(m_spf_format);
00101   DUMP_CIDX(m_has_allele_info);
00102   DUMP_CIDX(m_has_context_info);
00103   DUMP_CIDX(m_has_channel_info);
00104   DUMP_CIDX(m_has_rep_type_info);
00105 
00106   DUMP_CIDX_HEAD("required");
00107   DUMP_CIDX(m_name_cidx);
00108   DUMP_CIDX(m_type_cidx);
00109   DUMP_CIDX(m_num_match_cidx);
00110  
00111   DUMP_CIDX_HEAD("v2");
00112   DUMP_CIDX(m_v2_num_blocks_cidx);
00113   DUMP_CIDX(m_v2_block_sizes_cidx);
00114   DUMP_CIDX(m_v2_block_annotations_cidx);
00115     DUMP_CIDX(m_v2_num_probes_cidx);
00116   DUMP_CIDX(m_v2_probes_cidx);
00117   DUMP_CIDX(m_v2_block_alleles_cidx);
00118   DUMP_CIDX(m_v2_block_contexts_cidx);
00119   DUMP_CIDX(m_v2_block_channels_cidx);
00120   DUMP_CIDX(m_v2_block_rep_types_cidx);
00121 
00122   DUMP_CIDX_HEAD("v3");
00123   DUMP_CIDX(m_v3_allele_lbl_cidx);
00124   DUMP_CIDX(m_v3_allele_code_cidx);
00125   DUMP_CIDX(m_v3_context_lbl_cidx);
00126   DUMP_CIDX(m_v3_context_code_cidx);
00127   DUMP_CIDX(m_v3_channel_code_cidx);
00128   DUMP_CIDX(m_v3_annotation_code_cidx);
00129   DUMP_CIDX(m_v3_probe_id_cidx);
00130 
00131   DUMP_CIDX_HEAD("v4");
00132   DUMP_CIDX(m_v4_block_lbl_cidx);
00133   DUMP_CIDX(m_v4_annotation_code_cidx);
00134   DUMP_CIDX(m_v4_allele_code_cidx);
00135   DUMP_CIDX(m_v4_context_code_cidx);
00136   DUMP_CIDX(m_v4_channel_code_cidx);
00137   DUMP_CIDX(m_v4_rep_type_cidx);
00138   DUMP_CIDX(m_v4_probe_id_cidx);
00139 }

00146   m_spf_format=fmt;

00151 
00152 void affx::SpfFile::define_v2()
00153 {
00154   clearCidx();
00155 
00156   setFormat(2);
00157 
00158   //
00159   int cidx=0;
00160   m_name_cidx=cidx++;
00161   defineColumn(0,m_name_cidx,"name");
00162   m_type_cidx=cidx++;
00163   defineColumn(0,m_type_cidx,"type");
00164   //
00165   m_v2_num_blocks_cidx=cidx++;
00166   defineColumn(0,m_v2_num_blocks_cidx,"num_blocks");
00167   m_v2_block_sizes_cidx=cidx++;
00168   defineColumn(0,m_v2_block_sizes_cidx,"block_sizes");
00169   m_v2_block_annotations_cidx=cidx++;
00170   defineColumn(0,m_v2_block_annotations_cidx,"block_annotations");
00171   m_num_match_cidx=cidx++;
00172   defineColumn(0,m_num_match_cidx,"num_match");
00173   m_v2_num_probes_cidx=cidx++;
00174   defineColumn(0,m_v2_num_probes_cidx,"num_probes");
00175   m_v2_probes_cidx=cidx++;
00176   defineColumn(0,m_v2_probes_cidx,"probes");
00177   // optional columns
00178   if (m_has_allele_info) {
00179     m_v2_block_alleles_cidx=cidx++;
00180     defineColumn(0,m_v2_block_alleles_cidx,"block_alleles");
00181   }
00182   if (m_has_context_info) {
00183     m_v2_block_contexts_cidx=cidx++;
00184     defineColumn(0,m_v2_block_contexts_cidx,"block_contexts");
00185   }
00186   if (m_has_channel_info) {
00187     m_v2_block_channels_cidx=cidx++;
00188     defineColumn(0,m_v2_block_channels_cidx,"block_channels");
00189   }
00190   if (m_has_rep_type_info) {
00191     m_v2_block_rep_types_cidx=cidx++;
00192     defineColumn(0,m_v2_block_rep_types_cidx,"block_rep_types");
00193   }
00194 }
00195 
00196 void affx::SpfFile::define_v3()
00197 {
00198   clearCidx();
00199 
00200   setFormat(3);
00201 
00202   // level0
00203   m_name_cidx=0;
00204   defineColumn(0,m_name_cidx,"name");
00205   m_type_cidx=1;
00206   defineColumn(0,m_type_cidx,"type");
00207   m_num_match_cidx=2;
00208   defineColumn(0,m_num_match_cidx,"num_match");
00209   // level1
00210   int cidx1=0;
00211   m_v3_allele_lbl_cidx=cidx1++;
00212   defineColumn(1,m_v3_allele_lbl_cidx,"allele");
00213   if (m_has_allele_info) {
00214     m_v3_allele_code_cidx=cidx1++;
00215     defineColumn(1,m_v3_allele_code_cidx,"allele_code");
00216   }
00217   //
00218   int cidx2=0;
00219   m_v3_context_lbl_cidx=cidx2++;
00220   defineColumn(2,m_v3_context_lbl_cidx,"context");
00221   //
00222   m_v3_annotation_code_cidx=cidx2++;
00223   defineColumn(2,m_v3_annotation_code_cidx,"annotation");
00224   //
00225   if (m_has_context_info) {
00226     m_v3_context_code_cidx=cidx2++;
00227     defineColumn(2,m_v3_context_code_cidx,"context_code");
00228   }
00229   //
00230   if (m_has_channel_info) {
00231     m_v3_channel_code_cidx=cidx2++;
00232     defineColumn(2,m_v3_channel_code_cidx,"channel_code");
00233   }
00234   // level 3
00235   m_v3_probe_id_cidx=0;
00236   defineColumn(3,m_v3_probe_id_cidx,"probe_id");
00237 }
00238 
00239 void affx::SpfFile::define_v4()
00240 {
00241   clearCidx();
00242 
00243   setFormat(4);
00244 
00245   // level0
00246   m_name_cidx=0;
00247   defineColumn(0,m_name_cidx,"name");
00248   m_type_cidx=1;
00249   defineColumn(0,m_type_cidx,"type");
00250   m_num_match_cidx=2;
00251   defineColumn(0,m_num_match_cidx,"num_match");
00252   // level1
00253   int cidx1=0;
00254   m_v4_block_lbl_cidx=cidx1++;
00255   defineColumn(1,m_v4_block_lbl_cidx,"block");
00256   //
00257   m_v4_annotation_code_cidx=cidx1++;
00258   defineColumn(1,m_v4_annotation_code_cidx,"annotation");
00259   if (m_has_allele_info==1) {
00260     m_v4_allele_code_cidx=cidx1++;
00261     defineColumn(1,m_v4_allele_code_cidx,"allele_code");
00262   }
00263   if (m_has_context_info==1) {
00264     m_v4_context_code_cidx=cidx1++;
00265     defineColumn(1,m_v4_context_code_cidx,"context_code");
00266   }
00267   if (m_has_channel_info==1) {
00268     m_v4_channel_code_cidx=cidx1++;
00269     defineColumn(1,m_v4_channel_code_cidx,"channel_code");
00270   }
00271   if (m_has_rep_type_info==1) {
00272     m_v4_rep_type_cidx=cidx1++;
00273     defineColumn(1,m_v4_rep_type_cidx,"rep_type");
00274   }
00275   // level 2
00276   m_v4_probe_id_cidx=0;
00277   defineColumn(2,m_v4_probe_id_cidx,"probe_id");
00278 }
00279 
00280 void affx::SpfFile::define_file(int version)
00281 {
00282   if ((version==1)||(version==2)) {
00283     define_v2();
00284   }
00285   else if (version==3) {
00286     define_v3();
00287   } 
00288   else if (version==4) {
00289     define_v4();
00290   }
00291   else {
00292     APT_ERR_ABORT("bad spf version");
00293   }
00294 }
00295 
00296 int affx::SpfFile::writeSpf(const std::string& fileName)
00297 {
00298   //
00299   define_file(m_spf_format);
00300   addStandardHeaders();
00301   //
00302   if ((m_spf_format==affx::SpfFile::FMT_1)||(m_spf_format==affx::SpfFile::FMT_2)) {
00303     return writeTsv_v1(fileName);
00304   }
00305   else if ((m_spf_format==affx::SpfFile::FMT_3)||(m_spf_format==affx::SpfFile::FMT_4)) {
00306     return writeTsv_v2(fileName);
00307   }
00308   else {
00309     APT_ERR_ABORT("affx::SpfFile::writeSpf(): unknown format.");
00310     return -1;
00311   }
00312 }    
00313 
00314 int affx::SpfFile::writeSpf(const std::string& fileName,int format)
00315 {
00316   m_spf_format=format;
00317   return writeSpf(fileName);
00318 }
00319 
00321 
00322 int
00323 affx::SpfFile::determineFormat()
00324 {
00325   // The "_lbl_cidx" columns are just there for the humans.
00326   // we done really care if they arent there.
00327 
00328   if ((m_name_cidx<0)||(m_type_cidx<0)) {
00329     m_spf_format=0;
00330     return m_spf_format;
00331   }
00332   
00333   if ((m_v2_num_blocks_cidx>=0)        &&
00334       (m_v2_block_sizes_cidx>=0)       &&
00335       (m_v2_block_annotations_cidx>=0) &&
00336       (m_num_match_cidx           >=0) &&
00337       (m_v2_num_probes_cidx       >=0) &&
00338       (m_v2_probes_cidx           >=0)) {
00339     m_spf_format=2;
00340     return m_spf_format;
00341   }
00342   
00343   // allele_code and context are required for v3
00344   if ((m_v3_annotation_code_cidx>=0) &&
00345       (m_v3_allele_code_cidx>=0) &&
00346       (m_v3_context_code_cidx>=0) &&
00347       (m_v3_probe_id_cidx>=0)) {
00348     m_spf_format=3;
00349     return m_spf_format;
00350   }
00351   
00352   // allele_code, context_code and channel_code are optional for v4
00353   if ((m_v4_annotation_code_cidx>=0) &&
00354       (m_v4_probe_id_cidx>=0)) {
00355     m_spf_format=4;
00356     return m_spf_format;
00357   }
00358 
00359   // punt!
00360   m_spf_format=0;
00361   return m_spf_format;
00362 }
00363 
00364 int 
00365 affx::SpfFile::openSpf(const std::string& fileName)
00366 {
00367   if (open(fileName)!=affx::TSV_OK) {
00368     APT_ERR_ABORT("SpfFile::readSpf: Couldn't open '" + ToStr(fileName) + "' to read.");
00369   }
00370   //
00371   clearHeaderInfo();
00372   //
00373   getHeaderAppend("chip-type",m_header_chipTypes);
00374   getHeaderAppend("chip_type",m_header_chipTypes);
00375   //
00376   getHeader("spf-format",m_header_format);
00377   getHeader("chip_type",m_header_chipTypes);
00378   getHeader("num-cols",m_header_numCols);
00379   getHeader("num-rows",m_header_numRows);
00380   getHeader("num-probesets",m_header_numProbesets);
00381   getHeader("num-channels",m_header_numChannels);
00382 
00383   // zero out the cidx info first.
00384   clearCidx();
00385    
00386   // common to v1,v2,v3
00387   m_name_cidx              = cname2cidx(0,"name");
00388   m_type_cidx              = cname2cidx(0,"type");
00389   m_num_match_cidx         = cname2cidx(0,"num_match");
00390 
00391   // v1,v2
00392   m_v2_num_blocks_cidx = cname2cidx(0,"num_blocks");
00393   m_v2_block_sizes_cidx = cname2cidx(0,"block_sizes");
00394   m_v2_block_annotations_cidx = cname2cidx(0,"block_annotations");
00395   m_v2_num_probes_cidx = cname2cidx(0,"num_probes");
00396   m_v2_probes_cidx = cname2cidx(0,"probes");
00397   m_v2_block_alleles_cidx = cname2cidx(0,"block_alleles");
00398   m_v2_block_contexts_cidx = cname2cidx(0,"block_contexts");
00399   m_v2_block_channels_cidx = cname2cidx(0,"block_channels");
00400   m_v2_block_rep_types_cidx = cname2cidx(0,"block_rep_types");
00401 
00402   // v3
00403   // level 1
00404   m_v3_allele_lbl_cidx=cname2cidx(1,"allele");  // always the string "allele" for readablity
00405   m_v3_allele_code_cidx=cname2cidx(1,"allele_code");
00406   // level 2
00407   m_v3_context_lbl_cidx=cname2cidx(2,"context"); // always the string "context" for readablity
00408   m_v3_context_code_cidx=cname2cidx(2,"context_code");
00409   m_v3_annotation_code_cidx=cname2cidx(2,"annotation");
00410   m_v3_channel_code_cidx=cname2cidx(2,"channel_code");
00411   // level 3
00412   m_v3_probe_id_cidx=cname2cidx(3,"probe_id");
00413 
00414   // v4
00415   // level 1
00416   m_v4_block_lbl_cidx=cname2cidx(1,"block");  // always the string "block" for readablity
00417   m_v4_annotation_code_cidx=cname2cidx(1,"annotation");
00418   m_v4_allele_code_cidx=cname2cidx(1,"allele_code");
00419   m_v4_context_code_cidx=cname2cidx(1,"context_code");
00420   m_v4_channel_code_cidx=cname2cidx(1,"channel_code");
00421   m_v4_rep_type_cidx=cname2cidx(1,"rep_type");
00422   // level 2
00423   m_v4_probe_id_cidx=cname2cidx(2,"probe_id");
00424 
00425   // what does this file look like?
00426   determineFormat();
00427 
00428   //
00429   return affx::TSV_OK;
00430 }
00431 
00432 const char* spf_standard_headers[]={
00433   "spf-format",
00434   "chip_type", // @todo: we should only have "chip-type"
00435   "chip-type",
00436   "num-cols",
00437   "num-rows",
00438   "num-channels",
00439   NULL
00440 };
00441 
00442 void 
00443 affx::SpfFile::addStandardHeaders()
00444 {
00445   deleteHeaders(spf_standard_headers);
00446   //
00447   addHeader("spf-format",m_spf_format);
00448   addHeader("chip_type",m_header_chipTypes);
00449   addHeader("num-cols",m_header_numCols);
00450   addHeader("num-rows",m_header_numRows);
00451   addHeader("num-probesets",m_header_numProbesets);
00452   addHeader("num-channels",m_header_numChannels);
00453 }
